p.s: The given scene from the movie The Hate U Give, directed by George Tillmann Jr. and published in 2018, is about the relationship between the protagonist Starr and her boyfriend Chris, after a conflict between these characters.
The sequence begins with Chris going throuththrough the school floor and saying hello to his friends.
Starr watched Chris until Chris recognized Starr in the school.
Chris came by and puts his headphones on Starr's head to show her the beat he made.
Starr acts mad on Chris by giving him his headphones and saying, that she didn't liked what Chris did on another day.
After a short discussion about Starr feelings and behaiviorbehavior in their relationship Chris pulls the cable out of his mobile phone, so that everyone can hear his beat.
The scene ends with Starr, who forgave Chris in this awkward situation; Starr pulls Chris into another school floor, with less people and they kiss each other in the last scene.
